titleStmt.title: Faith and good vvorkes vnited in a sermon preached at the Spittle vpon VVednesday in Easter weeke, 1630. By Richard Reeks minister of the word at Little Ilford, in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Reeks, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper, for Iohn Harrigat, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Holy Lambe in Pater Noster Row,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Holy Lambe in Pater Noster Row
